desmoj.extensions.space3D

Class LayoutLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • desmoj.extensions.space3D.LayoutLoader

  • public abstract class LayoutLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    This class loads the Layout XML file into the Model. The XML file should contain the details about the pre-defined tracks and SpatialObjects.

    • Method Detail

      • createSimpleLocation

        protected SimpleLocation createSimpleLocation(org.w3c.dom.Element location)
        Create a SimpleLocation object based on the information the Track Element contains.
        Parameters:
        location - The element object extracted from the XML layout file.
        Returns:
        A SimpleLocation object.

      • createSimpleTrack

        protected SimpleTrack createSimpleTrack(org.w3c.dom.Element track)
        Create a SimpleTrack object based on the information the Track Element contains.
        Parameters:
        track - The element object extracted from the XML layout file.
        Returns:
        A SimpleTrack object.

      • createSpatialObject

        protected abstract SpatialObject createSpatialObject(org.w3c.dom.Element spatialObject)
        Creates a SpatialObject based on the SpatialObject element specified in the layout file.
        Parameters:
        spatialObject - The specified SpatialObject to be added.
        Returns:
        A SpatialObject which is specified by the element.

      • createTrack

        protected abstract Track createTrack(org.w3c.dom.Element track)
        Creates a track object based on the track element specified in the layout file.
        Parameters:
        track - The specified track to be added.
        Returns:
        A Track object which is specified by the element.

      • loadLayout

        public void loadLayout(java.lang.String filePathName)
        Loads the given XML file, create the specified Tracks and SpatialObjects. The tracks will be registered into the SpatialLayoutManager.
        Parameters:
        filePathName - A pathname string
